scripts.build: cd core && yarn core:build && cd ../extension && yarn extension:build
scripts.lint: cd core && yarn core:lint && cd ../extension && yarn extension:lint
scripts.test: cd core && yarn core:test && cd ../extension && yarn extension:test
scripts.format: cd core && yarn core:format && cd ../extension && yarn extension:format
scripts.publish: cd core && yarn core:publish && cd ../extension && yarn extension:publish && cd ..
